title: jaya jaya rAma
sahitya:
jaya jaya ramaNa jAgrhi vibhO 


anupallavi

  dEva nabhOmaNiriha dIdithi gaNairidAnimEva nAshayati nibida timira jAlam
tAvaka pAdAmburuha darshanam akhila jana bhavatApa samudayam vidaLayati yathA


 caraNam 1    madhura vENurava sudhAya madana janakana tarasA vidhura tAmapOhayanO vishva bandhO 
madhu murAdi danuja kula nidhana tOSita sama vibudha nivaha vAsudEva sukrta rAsE
    caraNam 2    taruNa gOpavadhU kalita dadhimatana samayE karAbharaNa mrdushinjitam mukharayati ghOSam
marakata ruci shakala mada haraNa parama paTutara sharIra nava sushama yaduvatamsha
    caraNam 3    mInA kUrmA mahitakiti vara narahari vAmanAnyUNa bhrugu suta rAma ramA ramaNa 
bhAnu sutApriya mukunda bhAvikalpika vara rUpa dIna pAlanapara shrI padmanAbha
